wave_3_per_point6=r = .5 + .5*(sin(sp*3.549)*.3 + .7*cos(sp*5.661));
wave_3_per_point7=g = .5 + .5*(sin(sp*5.493)*.5 + .5*cos(sp*6.615));

shapecode_0_border_g=1.000
shapecode_0_border_b=1.000
shapecode_0_border_a=0.000
shape_0_per_frame1=
shape_0_per_frame2=ang = int(rand(1001))*.001*6.2832;
shape_0_per_frame3=
shape_0_per_frame4=tex_ang = tex_ang + ang;
shape_0_per_frame5=tex_zoom = 1/rad*tex_zoom;
shape_0_per_frame6=
shape_0_per_frame7=ti = time;
shape_0_per_frame8=border_r = .5 + .5*sin(ti*1.123);
shape_0_per_frame9=border_g = .5 + .5*sin(ti*1.456);
shape_0_per_frame10=border_b = .5 + .5*sin(ti*1.789);
shape_0_per_frame11=ti = time;
shape_0_per_frame12=r = .5 + .5*sin(ti*1.123);
shape_0_per_frame13=g = .5 + .5*sin(ti*1.456);
shape_0_per_frame14=b = .5 + .5*sin(ti*1.789);
shape_0_per_frame15=ti = time - 1;
shape_0_per_frame16=r2 = .75 + .25*sin(ti*1.123);
shape_0_per_frame17=g2 = .75 + .25*sin(ti*1.456);
shape_0_per_frame18=b2 = .75 + .25*sin(ti*1.789);
shape_0_per_frame19=tex_cx=sin(time);
shapecode_1_enabled=1
shapecode_1_sides=100
shapecode_1_additive=0
shapecode_1_thickOutline=1
shapecode_1_textured=1
shapecode_1_num_inst=1
shapecode_1_x=0.500
shapecode_1_y=0.500
shapecode_1_rad=0.36442
shapecode_1_ang=0.00000
shapecode_1_tex_ang=1.57080
shapecode_1_tex_zoom=0.05819
shapecode_1_r=1.000
shapecode_1_g=1.000
shapecode_1_b=1.000
shapecode_1_a=1.000

shapecode_1_g2=1.000
shapecode_1_b2=1.000

shapecode_1_border_r=1.000
shapecode_1_border_g=1.000
shapecode_1_border_b=1.000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.000
shape_1_per_frame1=tex_ang=time*0.1;
shape_1_per_frame2=ang = int(rand(1001))*.001*6.2832;
shape_1_per_frame3=
shape_1_per_frame4=tex_ang = tex_ang + ang;
shape_1_per_frame5=tex_zoom = bass*0.4;
shape_1_per_frame6=
shape_1_per_frame7=ti = time;
shape_1_per_frame8=border_r = .5 + .5*sin(ti*1.123);
shape_1_per_frame9=border_g = .5 + .5*sin(ti*1.456);
shape_1_per_frame10=border_b = .5 + .5*sin(ti*1.789);
shape_1_per_frame11=ti = time;
shape_1_per_frame12=//r = .5 + .5*sin(ti*1.123);
shape_1_per_frame13=//g = .5 + .5*sin(ti*1.456);
shape_1_per_frame14=//b = .5 + .5*sin(ti*1.789);
shape_1_per_frame15=ti = time - 1;
shape_1_per_frame16=//r2 = .5 + .5*sin(ti*1.123);
shape_1_per_frame17=//g2 = .5 + .5*sin(ti*1.456);
shape_1_per_frame18=//b2 = .5 + .5*sin(ti*1.789);
shape_1_per_frame19=tex_cx=sin(time*0.5);
shapecode_2_enabled=0
shapecode_2_sides=100
shapecode_2_additive=0
shapecode_2_thickOutline=1
shapecode_2_textured=1
shapecode_2_num_inst=1
shapecode_2_x=0.500
shapecode_2_y=0.500
shapecode_2_rad=0.30158
shapecode_2_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_ang=6.28319
shapecode_2_tex_zoom=0.71290
shapecode_2_r=1.000
shapecode_2_g=1.000
shapecode_2_b=1.000
shapecode_2_a=1.000

shapecode_2_g2=1.000
shapecode_2_b2=1.000
shapecode_2_a2=1.000
shapecode_2_border_r=1.000
shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.000
shape_2_per_frame1=
shape_2_per_frame2=//ang = int(rand(1001))*.001*6.2832;
shape_2_per_frame3=
shape_2_per_frame4=//tex_ang = (bass_att*bass_att - (treb_att*treb_att + mid_att*mid_att)*.5)*.5;
shape_2_per_frame5=tex_ang = q6;
shape_2_per_frame6=tex_ang = tex_ang + ang;
shape_2_per_frame7=tex_zoom = 1/rad*q7;
shape_2_per_frame8=
shapecode_3_enabled=1
shapecode_3_sides=7
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=1.08920
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.62832
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=5.27792
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=1.000
shapecode_3_b=1.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=1.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=1.000
shapecode_3_a2=1.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.000
shape_3_per_frame1=
shape_3_per_frame2=ang = int(rand(1001))*.001*6.2832;
shape_3_per_frame3=
shape_3_per_frame4=tex_ang = tex_ang + ang;
shape_3_per_frame5=tex_zoom = 1/rad*tex_zoom;
shape_3_per_frame6=a=treb*0.5;
shape_3_per_frame7=a2=treb*0.1;
per_frame_1=wave_r = wave_r + 0.5*sin(time*1.13);
per_frame_2=wave_g = wave_g + 0.5*sin(time*1.23);
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_b + 0.5*sin(time*1.33);
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=wave_x = wave_x + 0.2*sin(0.32*time);
per_frame_6=wave_y = wave_y + 0.2*cos(0.32*time);
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=ob_r = wave_r;
per_frame_9=ob_g = wave_g;
per_frame_10=ob_b = wave_b;
per_frame_11=
per_frame_12=q1 = ob_r;
per_frame_13=q2 = ob_g;
per_frame_14=q3 = ob_b;
per_frame_15=cog = ocog+0.005*(bass+bass_att+(bass*bass_att)-2);
per_frame_16=ocog = below(cog,30000)*cog;
per_frame_17=q4 = cog;
per_pixel_1=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_2=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*q4)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_3=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*q4)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_4=zoom = zoom + 0.0095*(sin(10*ang) + sin(sin(q4*2*sin(q4)*rad))*0.3 - cos(rad)*0.1);
per_pixel_5=rot = rot + 0.08*abs(0.746-rad)*sin(2.2*(0.5-rad)+5.7*sin(0.1*q4));
per_pixel_6=sx = sx + 0.01*(0.99*1-rad)*sin(0.733*q4)*below(sin(q4),0);
per_pixel_7=sy = sy + 0.01*(0.99*1-rad)*cos(0.953*q4)*above(sin(q4),0);
per_pixel_8=zoom = zoom - 0.015*(0.5*abs(3)-rad)*below(rad,1.5);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`float2 zoom = 2;
warp_5=`float2 cntr = float2(-0,-0);
warp_6=`float2 c = float2(0.6,0.6); // complex constant
warp_7=`
warp_8=` float2 my_uv = (uv-0.5-cntr)*zoom;
warp_9=` my_uv = float2(my_uv.x*my_uv.x - my_uv.y*my_uv.y, 2*my_uv.x*my_uv.y) + c; // u -> u^2 + c
warp_10=`
warp_11=`zoom =1.81;
warp_12=`cntr = float2(0,0);
warp_13=`c = float2(0.448,0.701);
warp_14=`
warp_15=` float2 my_uv2 = (uv_orig-0.5-cntr)*zoom; // using uv_orig here - no contortion to the nice julia island
warp_16=` my_uv2 = float2(my_uv2.x*my_uv2.x - my_uv2.y*my_uv2.y, 2*my_uv2.x*my_uv2.y) + c; // u -> u^2 + c
warp_17=`
warp_18=`//ret.x = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, my_uv).x - 0.1;
warp_19=`ret = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, my_uv2) - 0.004;
warp_20=`
warp_21=` my_uv = lerp(my_uv, my_uv2, 0.5);
warp_22=`//ret.z = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, my_uv2).z - 0.1;
warp_23=`
warp_24=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz*-2 +
comp_4=`              GetBlur1(uv)*2 +
comp_5=`              GetBlur2(uv)*2 - 0.7;
comp_6=`    //ret *= 1.2;
comp_7=`}
